job_title: Data Tech with spark and AWS
jd: From: Vaishnavi, Xforia vaishnavi.d@xforia.com Reply to: vaishnavi.d@xforia.com Job Description : Candidates should be able toDevelop/upgrade spark Infrastructure scripts (EAC) for blue/green deployment on AWS Dev environment.Develop/Upgrade Jules pipeline to deploy Spark job.Execute jules pipeline and deploy spark job to AWS Dev environment.Execute BLUE / GREEN deployment pipeline using Jules for Spark job.Develop/upgrade AbInitio Infrastructure scripts (EAC) on AWS Dev environment for blue / green deployment.Develop/Upgrade Jules pipeline to deploy AbInitio scripts.Execute jules pipeline and deploy AbInitio scripts to AWS Dev environment.Execute BLUE / GREEN deployment pipeline using for AbInitio scripts.Nice to have Terraform.
